name: Picarto Resize following thumbnails
description: Resizes thumbnails in the following sidebar on Picarto.tv.
additional_info:
Current Version: 1.8

Known Bugs:
None

-------------------------------------------
1.8: Massive site change. I can't relocate thumbnails without making it look bad. (Mar 23)
-------------------------------------------
1.7: Picarto introduced DDOS Protection (replaced url with url-prefix to fix the added hash)
-------------------------------------------
1.6.5: Fix
-------------------------------------------
1.6: They updated the site again
-------------------------------------------
1.5: Major site layout change.
-------------------------------------------
1.4: NEW Layout!! 
-------------------------------------------
1.3: Fixed bottom of screen issue only noticed today ?
-------------------------------------------
1.2: Refixed to new change (Nov 2)
-------------------------------------------
1.1: Picarto updated their font. Had to move thumbnails a little more.
-------------------------------------------
1.0: Google Chrome, Firefox and Waterfox: Tested and working with extension.
Userscript: Tested working with Tampermonkey
